snippet: To make the case that he should be elected mayor of New York City, in the 69-page document, Bill de Blasio details proposals in 12 areas while summarizing his record as public advocate.
abstract: New York City Public Advocate Bill de Blasio will release detailed policy book as he continues to make case that he should be elected mayor of New York City; offers proposals in 12 areas while also summarizing his record on those same issues as public advocate and, previously, as member of City Council representing Park Slope, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: To make the case that he should be elected mayor of New York City, in the 69-page document, Bill de Blasio details proposals in 12 areas while summarizing his record as public advocate.

headline.main: De Blasio Offers Ideas in Policy Book for Election
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Offers Ideas In Policy Book For Election
